mapper.select: SELECT group_cd , cd , cdnm , use_yn , sn FROM CMMN_CD WHERE group_cd = #{dbParam}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apprHis(doc_num, group_cd, cd, sp_div, sp_date, sp_cont, sp_pay, reg_id) VALUES (#{doc_num}, #{group_cd}, #{cd}, #{sp_div}, #{sp_date}, #{sp_cont}, #{sp_pay}, #{mber_id})
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , V.* FROM ( SELECT A.doc_num , A.doc_title , M.mber_nm , M.mber_num , A.doc_date , A.doc_group , A.doc_step , A.doc_indent , A.doc_cnt FROM apprBoard A INNER JOIN memberJoin M ON A.mber_num = M.mber_num ORDER BY doc_num DESC ) V JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R )T WHERE ROWNUM >= #{first} AND ROWNUM <= #{last}

SELECT B.doc_num , B.doc_title , M.mber_nm , M.mber_num , M.mber_id FROM ( SELECT doc_num , doc_title , mber_num FROM apprBoard WHERE doc_num = #{doc_num} ) B INNER JOIN memberJoin M ON B.mber_num = M.mber_num

SELECT b.doc_num , b.sp_num , b.group_cd , ( SELECT a.cdnm FROM CMMN_CD a WHERE (a.group_cd = 'AD01' AND a.cd = b.group_cd) ) group_cd_nm , b.cd ,( SELECT a.cdnm FROM CMMN_CD a WHERE (a.group_cd = CONCAT('AD01', b.group_cd) AND a.cd = b.cd) ) cd_nm , b.sp_div ,( SELECT a.cdnm FROM CMMN_CD a WHERE (a.group_cd = 'AD02' AND a.cd = b.sp_div) ) sp_div_nm , b.sp_date , b.sp_cont , b.sp_pay FROM apprHis b WHERE doc_num = #{doc_num} ORDER BY sp_num
